name: General Rule Violation
description: A coding standard violation was detected by PHP_CodeSniffer but the specific rule is not defined in this plugin. The rule source will be included in the issue message.

name: Anonymous class closing brace must be on a line by itself
description: The closing brace of an anonymous class must be on a line by itself.

name: Anonymous class declaration spacing
description: There must be a single space after the class keyword in anonymous class declarations.

name: Class instantiation must use parentheses
description: When instantiating a class, parentheses must always be present even when there are no arguments.

name: Class closing brace must be on a line by itself
description: The closing brace of a class must be on a line by itself and must not be followed by any comment or statement on the same line.

name: No space before class opening brace
description: There must be no space before the opening brace of a class.

name: Boolean operators must be consistently placed
description: Boolean operators between conditions must be at the beginning or end of the line, but not mixed.

name: Control structure closing parenthesis placement
description: The closing parenthesis of a multi-line control structure must be on its own line.

name: Control structure first expression placement
description: The first expression in a multi-line control structure must be on the next line after the opening parenthesis.

name: Control structure line indentation
description: Lines in multi-line control structures must be indented correctly.

name: Control structure opening brace spacing
description: There must be no blank lines after the opening brace of a control structure.

name: Declare statement directive spacing
description: There must be no space after the directive in a declare statement.

name: File header position
description: The file-level docblock must be on the line immediately following the opening PHP tag.

name: File header incorrect order
description: The file-level blocks must be in the correct order: opening tag, file docblock, declare statements, namespace, use statements.

name: File header block spacing
description: There must be one blank line after a file-level block.

name: Import statement must not have leading backslash
description: Import statements (use) must not begin with a leading backslash.

name: Opening PHP tag must be on its own line
description: The opening PHP tag must be on a line by itself when used in a file containing only PHP.

name: Nullable type declaration spacing after question mark
description: There must be no space after the question mark in a nullable type declaration.

name: Nullable type declaration spacing before question mark
description: There must be no space before the question mark in a nullable type declaration.

name: Return type declaration spacing before colon
description: There must be no space before the colon in a return type declaration.

name: Return type declaration spacing after colon
description: There must be exactly one space between the colon and the type in a return type declaration.

name: Use short form of type keywords
description: Short form of type keywords (bool, int) must be used instead of long form (boolean, integer).

name: Compound namespace depth limit
description: Compound namespaces with a depth of more than two levels must not be used.

name: Operator spacing after
description: There must be at least one space after an operator.

name: Operator spacing before
description: There must be at least one space before an operator.

name: Class constant visibility required
description: Class constants must have visibility declarations.

name: One trait import per use declaration
description: Each trait import must be in its own use statement.

name: Trait use declaration placement
description: Trait use declarations must be placed right after the opening brace of a class.

name: Line length limit exceeded
description: Lines should not exceed 120 characters; soft limit is 80 characters.

name: Tabs must not be used for indentation
description: Spaces must be used for indentation, not tabs.

name: Class extends keyword placement
description: The extends keyword must be on the same line as the class name.

name: Class implements keyword placement
description: The implements keyword must be on the same line as the class name or extends clause.

name: Class opening brace must be on new line
description: The opening brace for a class must be on the line after the definition.

name: One property per declaration
description: Each property must be declared on its own line.

name: Property names must not be prefixed with underscore
description: Property names should not be prefixed with an underscore to indicate visibility.

name: No blank line after control structure opening brace
description: There must be no blank line after the opening brace of a control structure.

name: Use elseif instead of else if
description: The keyword elseif should be used instead of else if.

name: Switch case break statement indentation
description: Break statements in switch cases must be indented to the same level as the case body.

name: Closing PHP tag not allowed
description: Files containing only PHP code must not have a closing PHP tag.

name: File must end with newline
description: All PHP files must end with a single blank line.

name: Function call spacing after closing bracket
description: There must be no space after the closing parenthesis of a function call.

name: Function call spacing before closing bracket
description: There must be no space before the closing parenthesis of a function call.

name: Function call spacing before opening bracket
description: There must be no space between the function name and the opening parenthesis.

name: Function closing brace spacing
description: There must be no blank line before the closing brace of a function.

name: Method names must not be prefixed with underscore
description: Method names should not be prefixed with an underscore to indicate visibility.

name: Blank line required after namespace declaration
description: There must be one blank line after the namespace declaration.

name: One use declaration per statement
description: Each use declaration must be on its own line.

name: Blank line required after use declarations
description: There must be one blank line after the last use statement.

name: Class name must be in PascalCase
description: Class names must be declared in PascalCase (StudlyCaps).

name: Control structure spacing after closing brace
description: There must be a single space after the closing brace of a control structure.

name: Control structure spacing after keyword
description: There must be a single space after control structure keywords.

name: Function opening brace on new line
description: The opening brace of a function must be on a new line.

name: Multi-line function opening brace placement
description: The opening brace of a multi-line function must be on a new line.

name: Method visibility declaration required
description: All methods must have a visibility declaration (public, protected, or private).

name: Control structure spacing after opening parenthesis
description: There must be no space after the opening parenthesis of a control structure.

name: Control structure spacing before closing parenthesis
description: There must be no space before the closing parenthesis of a control structure.

name: Scope keyword spacing
description: There must be a single space after scope keywords (public, protected, private, static, abstract, final).

name: No trailing whitespace
description: Lines must not have trailing whitespace.

name: Cyclomatic complexity limit exceeded
description: The cyclomatic complexity of this code exceeds the configured maximum.

name: Cyclomatic complexity too high
description: The cyclomatic complexity of this code is higher than recommended.

name: Yoda conditions are not allowed
description: Yoda conditions (where the constant is on the left side of the comparison) are not allowed.

name: Trait use declarations must not be grouped
description: Trait use declarations must not be grouped in a single statement.

name: Post-statement comment found
description: Comments should not be placed on the same line as statements.

name: Post-statement annotation comment found
description: Annotation comments should not be placed on the same line as statements.

name: Missing comma in array declaration
description: Each item in a multi-line array declaration must be followed by a comma.

name: Function call argument indentation
description: Arguments in multi-line function calls must be indented correctly.

name: Multiple arguments in function call
description: Each argument in a multi-line function call must be on its own line.

name: No space after cast
description: There must be no space between a cast and the variable.

name: Property visibility declaration missing
description: Properties must have a visibility declaration (public, protected, or private).

name: Incorrect scope indentation
description: Indentation inside scopes does not match the expected level.

name: Spacing before 'as' in foreach loop
description: There must be a single space before the 'as' keyword in foreach loops.

name: Function call closing bracket line
description: The closing parenthesis of a multi-line function call must be on a new line.

name: Incorrect scope indentation
description: Indentation inside scopes does not match the expected level.

name: Content before scope closing brace
description: No content is allowed before a scope closing brace.

name: Newline before function opening brace
description: A newline is required before the opening brace of a multi-line function declaration.

name: Class closing brace after body
description: The closing brace of a class must be on a new line after the class body.

name: No blank line after trait use declaration
description: There must be no blank line after a trait use declaration.

name: Function call argument spacing
description: Arguments in function calls must be properly spaced.

name: Multi-line function declaration formatting
description: Multi-line function declarations must follow formatting rules.

name: Side effects with symbols found
description: A file that declares new symbols (classes, functions, etc.) must not cause side effects.

name: Method name not in camelCaps
description: Method names must be declared in camelCaps.

name: Deprecated function used
description: Deprecated PHP functions must not be used.

name: Empty line in function call signature
description: There must be no empty lines within a function call signature.
